name: Project Δ
description:
A small turn based JRPG -like project made by a group of students. 

Embark on an adventure with a brave young man, Amoon Guss, and defeat monsters in a fantasy world with post-apocalyptic features.

This is  a prototype and therefore contains some bugs, and also will likely never be finished.

Some writing in the game is in Finnish, however they are merely for comic relief purposes.

----INSTRUCTIONS----

World Map:

WASD or Arrow keys to Move

Esc to use Menu

In Battle:

Sword icon for melee attack

Lightning icon for magic attack

Potion icon to use potions
